translation.en: -♪ Spins madly on ♪ -Oh, great.
Well, that looks like a nasty bump.
-How do you feel? -Not great.
I'm not surprised.
Word to the wise.
That particular patient always requires restraints.
Right. There wasn't a chart.
It's your first day, huh?
-Yeah. -Always get the chart.
-Okay? -Yeah.
Don't wanna walk into a situation totally blind.
-You'll wind up-- -Knocked on my ass?
[chuckles] Yeah.
[sighs] Have a good day.
-Oh! -You need to get out of the car.
-What? -You need to get out of the car, ma'am.
translation.it: - Scenda dall'auto. - Cosa? Deve scendere dall'auto, signora. È bloccata nel fosso.

translation.en: -Your vehicle is stuck in the ditch. -What?
translation.it: Deve scendere dall'auto, signora. È bloccata nel fosso. Che cosa?

translation.en: Oh, it's unbelievable.
Well, you're lucky you didn't smash this ridiculous little car into a tree.
translation.it: È fortunata a non aver sfasciato questa ridicola auto contro un albero.

translation.en: Thank you for stopping. I'll just call AAA.
translation.it: Grazie per essersi fermato. Chiamo l'assistenza.

translation.en: Uh... Look around.
You're in a heavily wooded area. There's no cell reception here.
translation.it: È in una zona boschiva. Qui non c'è campo.

translation.en: Damn it.
I'll call Bert once we get into town.
translation.it: Chiamo Bert una volta in città.

translation.en: If he's not too busy, maybe you'll get your car back this week.
translation.it: Se non è troppo occupato, forse riavrà la sua auto questa settimana.

translation.en: Are you comin' or not?
Um... Could you drop me at the McCrea cabin?
It's in Virgin River. I've got the address here.
translation.it: È a Virgin River. Ho l'indirizzo qui.

translation.en: Anyone who lives within 50 miles of here knows the McCrea cabin.
translation.it: Chiunque viva nel raggio di 80 chilometri conosce la baita McCrea.

translation.en: Oh. Well, from the photo, it's beautiful.
translation.it: Oh. Beh, dalla foto è bellissima.

translation.en: Here.
Folks around here, we don't pay each other to be neighborly.
translation.it: Qui non ci paghiamo per essere cortesi.

translation.en: Just somethin' we do.
Right. I'm sorry.
Thank you.
And here we are.
[man] That's a beaut, huh?
[chuckles] Oh! Someone pulled a fast one on you.
translation.it: Le hanno giocato un brutto tiro.

translation.en: Never book your vacation online, they'll scam you every time.
translation.it: Non prenoti mai le vacanze online, è sempre una truffa.

translation.en: No, I-- I'm not on vacation. I'm here for a job.
translation.it: Non sono in vacanza. Sono qui per lavoro.

translation.en: I'm the new nurse.
I'm-- I'm actually a nurse practitioner and midwife.
I'm gonna be working with Dr. Mullins.
I heard he's handling the practice alone, and it's getting to be too much for him.
translation.it: Ho saputo che esercita da solo e sta diventando troppo per lui.

translation.en: Oh, is-- is that what you heard, huh?
-Okay. -Yeah. I think he's in his 70s and still working full time.
translation.it: Sì. Credo che abbia 70 anni e lavori ancora a tempo pieno.

translation.en: Oh, it's a wonder he's still above ground.
translation.it: È incredibile che sia ancora al mondo.

translation.en: So, old Doc hired ya, huh?
translation.it: Quindi l'ha assunta il vecchio Doc.

translation.en: Well, Hope McCrea did the actual hiring.
I'm so sorry. I don't know your name.
translation.it: Mi scusi. Non so il suo nome.

translation.en: I'm Melinda Monroe. People call me Mel.
translation.it: Io sono Melinda Monroe. Mi chiamano tutti Mel.

translation.en: I'm Vernon.
People call me Doc Mullins.
And for the record, missy,
Oh. Oh, what is that?
-Hello? -[woman] Hello?
Hi.
Melinda!
I'm Hope McCrea.
As the mayor of Virgin River,
I'd like to officially welcome you to our little slice of heaven.
translation.it: ti do il benvenuto ufficiale nel nostro piccolo angolo di paradiso.

translation.en: Hi, Hope. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I just--
I'm a little confused.
This is what you sent me.
The-- "This farmhouse-chic cabin...
translation.it: Questa baita in stile fattoria chic,

translation.en: nestled in the woods of Northern California
translation.it: immersa nei boschi della California del Nord,

translation.en: is designed to enjoy all the trappings of country life?"
translation.it: è l'ideale per godersi i piaceri della vita di campagna?

translation.en: Like-- "Farmhouse-chic" is not an accurate description of this property.
translation.it: "Fattoria chic" non è l'esatta descrizione di questa proprietà.

translation.en: I admit, I-- I haven't gotten around to taking a more current photo.
translation.it: Lo ammetto, non sono riuscita a fare una foto più attuale.

translation.en: Okay, well, the job I accepted included housing for a year.
translation.it: Il lavoro che ho accettato prevedeva un anno di alloggio.

translation.en: -And I obviously can't stay here. -Um...
translation.it: E ovviamente non posso stare qui.

translation.en: I'll have it cleaned.
Was that-- Did you just put a bird's-- Is that a bird's nest from the oven?
translation.it: È un nido d'uccello quello che ha preso dal forno?

translation.en: You did come a bit early.
No, I didn't. I'm three days late.
translation.it: No. Sono in ritardo di tre giorni.

translation.en: Well, no need to get all twisted up.
-Well... -I can wake up the Fitches.
Jo Ellen and Nick rent out their extra rooms.
translation.it: Jo Ellen e Nick affittano le stanze in più.

translation.en: Of course, the husband's a bit handsy.
translation.it: Il marito allunga un po' le mani.

translation.en: He pretends it's an accident, but it isn't.
translation.it: Fa finta che sia per sbaglio, ma non lo è.

translation.en: Um... Anyway, you look like you can take care of yourself.
translation.it: Comunque, sembri poter badare a te stessa.

translation.en: Oh, well, at least the fridge is stocked with gourmet foods and beverages.
translation.it: Almeno il frigo è pieno di cibi e bevande gourmet.

translation.en: I was going to take care of that earlier,
but we... we had a ribbon cutting ceremony over at the firehouse.
translation.it: ma abbiamo fatto una cerimonia d'inaugurazione alla caserma dei pompieri.

translation.en: Got ourselves a new hose.
-When did you eat last? -Why?
translation.it: - Quand'è l'ultima volta che hai mangiato? - Perché?

translation.en: Hungry equals cranky.
And between us gals, you don't wear cranky well.
translation.it: E detto tra noi, il nervosismo non ti dona.

translation.en: -Hm. -Head to Jack's. By the time you get back,
translation.it: Vai da Jack, e quando torni,

translation.en: I'll have the hot water running and fresh towels and blankets.
translation.it: ci sarà l'acqua calda, asciugamani e coperte.

translation.en: -Who's Jack? I-- -Jack's Bar.
Only place to eat in town after five. You can walk.
translation.it: Il solo posto per mangiare dopo le 17:00. Ci arrivi a piedi.

translation.en: Out the door and to the left.
Okay, but we're not done talking about this. Of course we aren't.
translation.it: - Ok, ma il discorso non finisce qui. - Certo che no.

translation.en: Bye.
♪ You're bringin' trouble ♪ ♪ You keep me hangin' ♪
-Ricky. -Yeah?
More glasses, please. Uh, sure, boss.
So, what are we havin'?
Whiskey? Soda? Wine?
You look like a wine person.
You need a minute?
Uh, no. Uh, any chance of getting a cosmo?
Nope. Not unless you brought your own Cointreau.
translation.it: No, a meno che non abbia tu il Cointreau.

translation.en: I did not.
Uh... So, mixed drinks are not...
Not our thing.
But I have all the boys, Johnnie, Jack, and Jim.
translation.it: Ma ho i ragazzi: Johnnie, Jack e Jim.

translation.en: All the regular stuff and beer. Just no frills.
translation.it: Tutta la roba normale e birra. Niente fronzoli.

translation.en: [sighs] All right, make it a Jim straight up. Okay.
translation.it: - Fammi un Jim liscio. - Va bene.

translation.en: I commend you on your choice.
-Thank you. -Mm-hm.
Well, I didn't know city girls could shoot whiskey.
translation.it: Non sapevo che quelle di città si seccassero il whisky.

translation.en: What makes you think I'm a city girl?
translation.it: Cosa ti fa pensare che sia una di città?

translation.en: Come on. Cosmo?
Wow. You should be a detective.
No. My days of tracking bad guys are over.
translation.it: No. Ho smesso di stanare i cattivi.

translation.en: -What? -Sorry.
translation.it: Che c'è? Scusa. Non riceviamo molti visitatori qui.

translation.en: We don't get a lot of visitors. Certainly not as beautiful as you.
translation.it: Scusa. Non riceviamo molti visitatori qui. Di certo non belli come te.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Does that line really work?
Oh, you'd be surprised.
Well, you're lucky we're not in Los Angeles,
translation.it: Per fortuna non siamo a Los Angeles,

translation.en: because Angelinos can smell BS a mile away.
translation.it: perché lì le stronzate le fiutano a un chilometro di distanza.

translation.en: Oh, really? That's one of the reasons why I love living here so much.
translation.it: Davvero? È uno dei motivi per cui amo vivere qui.

translation.en: -People aren't so jaded. -[chuckles]
translation.it: La gente non è così cinica.

translation.en: I'm Jack Sheridan.
So, is this your bar?
Well, it will be in about 60 more payments.
translation.it: Beh, lo sarà tra altre 60 rate.

translation.en: So, Miss Mel Monroe from LA,
translation.it: Allora, signorina Mel Monroe da Los Angeles,

translation.en: what brings you to our tiny little hamlet?
translation.it: che cosa la porta nel nostro paesino?

translation.en: -Work. -Yeah?
Where you staying?
Uh, the McCrea cabin.
Oof. What'd you do to deserve that?
[laughs] Yeah, I should have come up and vetted the place first.
translation.it: Sarei dovuta venire prima a controllare il posto.

translation.en: Oh, come on.
I think spontaneity's an admirable quality.
translation.it: La spontaneità è una qualità ammirevole.

translation.en: Oh, no. You-- you can't credit me with being spontaneous.
translation.it: No, la spontaneità non è proprio il mio forte.

translation.en: [sighs] No, it once took me six months to buy a crêpe pan.
translation.it: Ci ho messo sei mesi per comprare una padella da crêpe.

translation.en: -Six months. -Six months.
Yeah, I usually check everything three times, and then I check it again.
translation.it: Sì, di solito controllo tutto tre volte e poi controllo di nuovo.

translation.en: Used to drive my...
-So, how long you here for? -Um...
A year.
I'm working with Dr. Mullins.
I'm a nurse.
Oh, that should be an experience.
Yeah. I imagine it's gonna resemble the cabin.
translation.it: Già. La immagino un po' come la baita.

translation.en: -Uncomfortable. -Exactly.
I think you might be right.
So, you know Dr. Mullins?
Oh, everybody knows everybody around here.
-Small town. -Right.
And it's Doc.
He does not like formalities.
Oh, well, he does not like me.
I basically called him old.
But in my defense,
I didn't know it was him I was talking to when I said it.
translation.it: non sapevo che stessi parlando con lui quando l'ho detto.

translation.en: -He is old. -I know, right?
translation.it: - È vecchio davvero. - Lo so. Vero?

translation.en: Thank you.
-Mel, Preacher. -Hi.
Yeah, he's a man of few words, but he's a good friend,
translation.it: È uno di poche parole ma è un buon amico e un ottimo cuoco.

translation.en: -and he's a great cook. -Mm.
translation.it: ma è un buon amico e un ottimo cuoco.

translation.en: This is amazing. What is this?
Squirrel.
-That was too easy. -That's not funny.
translation.it: - È stato troppo facile. - Non è divertente.

translation.en: [laughs] You're dining on squash and lentils.
You know what? I actually have had squirrel,
and if it's done right, it's pretty tasty.
translation.it: e se è fatto bene, è buono.

translation.en: Okay, well, I'm gonna take your word on that.
translation.it: Ok, mi fido della tua parola.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no.
If I have any more, I won't be able to find the cabin.
translation.it: Se ne bevo ancora, non riuscirò a trovare la baita.

translation.en: Which might not be a bad thing, so...
translation.it: Che potrebbe essere un bene, quindi...

translation.en: [Mel] It's my car. God bless you, Bert.
translation.it: È la mia auto. Che Dio ti benedica, Bert.

translation.en: I can't sleep in that.
You certainly can't drive.
Oh, no, no, no.
No. I mean, leaving town's just not even an option.
translation.it: No! Lasciare il paese non è neanche un'opzione.

translation.en: Would you like to know why?
I will tell you.
Because... I sold my house...
translation.it: Perché ho venduto la mia casa

translation.en: and most of my belongings.
And then I quit my job.
And I moved to this town that I've never heard of just so I could live in there.
translation.it: E sono venuta in un paese che non ho mai sentito nominare per viverci.

translation.en: -[Jack] Yep. -[Mel] So...
I hate it when Joey's right.
You know?
Husband?
Sister.
-Yeah. -Well...
if I had a spare room, I'd offer, but...
translation.it: Se avessi una stanza libera te la offrirei, ma...

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. That's sweet, but it's... it's fine.
translation.it: No. Sei gentile, ma non fa niente.

translation.en: I'll just, you know, it'll be one night.
It'll be like camping. Right?
translation.it: Sarà come stare in campeggio. No?

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
It's not that bad, right?
Well...
Perspective is most often the key to happiness.
translation.it: La prospettiva è la chiave della felicità.

translation.en: So, what you're saying is that acclimation is possible.
translation.it: Quindi stai dicendo che è possibile acclimatarsi.

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
Just try not to insult any more residents.
translation.it: Cerca di non insultare altri abitanti.

translation.en: Thank you, Jack.
Thank you for the... the help, and the kind words, and food.
translation.it: Grazie per l'aiuto, le parole gentili e il cibo.

translation.en: But mostly, thank you for the whiskey.
translation.it: Ma soprattutto grazie per il whisky.

translation.en: Any time, Mel.
Hey, Mark, do you know which box the towels are in?
translation.it: Mark, sai in che scatola sono gli asciugamani?

translation.en: -[laughs] -No...
but I found a set of sheets.
What are you doing with this?
I'm drying my hands.
This is personally autographed by Bob Seger
translation.it: Questo è autografato da Bob Seger in persona

translation.en: and the entire Silver Bullet Band.
Handed down to me by my father, who was at Cobo Hall in Detroit
translation.it: Tramandatomi da mio padre, che era al Cobo Hall di Detroit

translation.en: on the night of the live recording of their very first album.
translation.it: la sera della registrazione dal vivo del loro primo album.

translation.en: Now, one beautiful day in the not-too-distant future,
translation.it: Un bel giorno in un futuro non troppo lontano

translation.en: I'm gonna hand this on to our son, Mark Junior.
translation.it: lo darò a nostro figlio, Mark Junior.

translation.en: -Mm. -And he to his son, Mark Junior Junior. And so on and so forth.
translation.it: E lui a suo figlio, Mark Junior Junior. E così via.

translation.en: What if we have a girl?
[whispers] What if we have a girl?
Come on!
[groans] I hate this place.
It's too early for lectures.
translation.it: È troppo presto per la predica.

translation.en: Hey, I didn't say a thing.
Yeah, you didn't have to.
So?
The pretty lady make it home last night?
translation.it: La bella signora è arrivata a casa ieri sera?

translation.en: She had a ring on.
Yeah, I wasn't sure you noticed.
I did.
That gun's not loaded, right?
translation.it: Quel fucile non è carico, vero?

translation.en: Okay. Uh, first, I just wanted to say thank you for stopping and helping me last night.
translation.it: Ok. Primo, volevo ringraziarla per essersi fermato e avermi aiutato ieri sera.

translation.en: And second, I would like to apologize for what I said.
translation.it: E poi, vorrei scusarmi per ciò che ho detto.

translation.en: The part where you called me old
or the part where you said I can't handle my practice?
translation.it: o aver detto che non so gestire il mio studio?

translation.en: In my defense, I was told by Mrs. McCrea that you were elderly
translation.it: In mia difesa, la sig.ra McCrea mi aveva detto che era anziano e vicino alla pensione.

translation.en: -and nearing retirement. -[sighs]
translation.it: che era anziano e vicino alla pensione.

translation.en: It took me 30 years to build this practice from scratch.
translation.it: Ci ho messo 30 anni per avviare lo studio. Da zero.

translation.en: No help.
No nurse. I don't need ya.
Well, I signed a contract. Hah. Not with me, you didn't.
translation.it: - Ho firmato un contratto. - Non con me.

translation.en: I don't even recall interviewing you,
but maybe that's... that's just my dementia actin' up.
translation.it: ma forse è colpa della mia demenza.

translation.en: Well, I was hired to do a job, and I'm here to do that job.
translation.it: Sono stata assunta per fare un lavoro e sono qui per farlo.

translation.en: You know, in this county, trespassers can be shot...
translation.it: Sai, in questa contea, agli intrusi si può sparare...

translation.en: on sight.
Uh, I'm not trespassing.
Do you work here? No.
Are you a patient here? No.
Did I invite you in? No.
If it looks like a duck and quacks like a duck,
translation.it: Se sembra un'anatra e starnazza come un'anatra,

translation.en: that is a duck.
Okay. What are you gonna do, shoot me?
Well, it's finally happened.
-You've lost your damn mind. -Ow. You threatened her with a gun?
translation.it: Hai perso la testa. L'hai minacciata con un fucile?

translation.en: I simply educated her
translation.it: L'ho semplicemente istruita su alcune leggi locali.

translation.en: -on some of our local laws. -You are a stubborn goat.
translation.it: L'ho semplicemente istruita su alcune leggi locali. Sei una capra testarda.

translation.en: I think you mean stubborn old goat.
You're old. I'm old. It's not a secret.
translation.it: Siamo vecchi. Non è un segreto.

translation.en: -I told you I would find somebody myself. -Maybe I should just go--
translation.it: - Ti ho detto che avrei trovato qualcuno. - Forse dovrei andare.

translation.en: -Go! -Stay!
I gave you an entire year.
translation.it: Ti ho dato un anno intero.

translation.en: This is not your business.
-This town depends on both of us. -And who put you in charge?
translation.it: - Il paese dipende da entrambi. - Chi ti ha messo al comando?

translation.en: The town did when they elected me mayor.
translation.it: Il paese quando mi ha eletta sindaca.

translation.en: -You ran unopposed. -The point is, I won.
translation.it: Eri l'unica candidata. Il punto è che ho vinto.

translation.en: You are the only one who thinks I need any help.
translation.it: Sei l'unica che pensa che mi serva aiuto.

translation.en: -The only one. -[Hope] Bull.
Everyone thinks you need help. They're just too scared to tell you.
translation.it: Tutti pensano che ti serva aiuto. Ma hanno troppa paura a dirtelo.

translation.en: Vernon, we both know you can't be in two places at once.
translation.it: Sappiamo entrambi che non puoi essere in due posti contemporaneamente.

translation.en: Even for you, that was low.
translation.it: Questo è un colpo basso persino per te.

translation.en: [sighs] I thought you were dead.
Hey, I'm sorry, sis. I--
Yeah, I was about to call out the National Guard.
translation.it: Stavo per chiamare la Guardia Nazionale.

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, they probably wouldn't be able to find this place, anyway.
translation.it: Forse non riuscirebbero a trovare questo posto.

translation.en: What's wrong?
Nothing. I'm fi-- I'm fine.
I'm worried about you. Just tell me what's goin' on.
translation.it: Sono preoccupata per te. Dimmi che succede.

translation.en: Um, nothing.
Nothing, nothing. I'm... fine.
[sobs] I just...
It's just this doctor that I'm working for doesn't want me here.
translation.it: ...il dottore per cui lavoro non mi vuole qui.

translation.en: And this cabin I'm in, it's just...
translation.it: E la baita in cui sto

translation.en: it's just awful.
And I...
I just feel really alone right now.
translation.it: Mi sento davvero sola in questo momento.

translation.en: Mel, you are not alone.
Okay? Come back here.
You can stay with us for as long as you want.
translation.it: Puoi restare da noi quanto vuoi.

translation.en: Mel, stop trying to punish yourself for what happened.
translation.it: Smettila di punirti per ciò che è successo.

translation.en: Nobody blames you.
translation.it: Nessuno te ne fa una colpa.

translation.en: Just come home.
Honey, all you changed by moving was your address.
translation.it: Trasferendoti hai solo cambiato il tuo indirizzo.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Joe. I'm gonna call you tomorrow, okay?
translation.it: Mi dispiace, Joe. Ti chiamo domani.

translation.en: -I love you. -No.
Hey.
I've got goat, beef, venison, rabbit, and buffalo.
translation.it: Ho capra, manzo, cervo, coniglio e bufalo.

translation.en: Uh... Any fish?
You know, you should try the salad with the shaved brussels sprouts and kale.
translation.it: Prova l'insalata con cavoletti di Bruxelles e verza.

translation.en: -Kale? -Yeah.
All of Preacher's vegetables are farm-to-table,
translation.it: Le verdure di Preacher sono a chilometro zero,

translation.en: and the farm is about 50 feet from the table.
Okay, great. Well, I'll have that salad, please.
-Thanks for the assist. -I'm Paige Lassiter.
translation.it: - Grazie per l'aiuto. - Sono Paige Lassiter.

translation.en: I run the bakery truck.
-Hi. I'm Mel-- -Monroe. Yeah, the new nurse.
translation.it: - Ciao. Sono Mel... - Monroe. Sì, la nuova infermiera.

translation.en: In small towns, the internet is slow, but the gossip is fast.
translation.it: Nei paesini internet è lento, ma i pettegolezzi sono veloci.

translation.en: Right.
Is that a Celine bag?
Yes, it is.
I'm probably the only person in Virgin River with a subscription to Vogue.
translation.it: Sono forse l'unica persona a Virgin River con un abbonamento a Vogue.

translation.en: -So, this... -[chuckles]
Um... Anyway, you should stop by for a muffin or something.
translation.it: Comunque, passa a prenderti un muffin.

translation.en: -Oh? -Yeah. Us girls should stick together.
translation.it: - Eh? - Noi ragazze dobbiamo stare unite.

translation.en: Absolutely.
-Okay. It's nice to meet you. -You too.
translation.it: - È stato un piacere. - Anche per me.

translation.en: Look...
-you are a brilliant doctor... -Huh.
But when you're finally ready to hang up your stethoscope,
translation.it: Ma quando sarai pronto ad appendere lo stetoscopio,

translation.en: you'll be leaving behind a gaping hole in this community.
translation.it: lascerai un grande vuoto in questa comunità.

translation.en: I don't even know her.
She ranked top of her class at UC Irvine,
translation.it: Era la migliore del suo anno alla UC Irvine,

translation.en: did her practical at County USC,
translation.it: ha fatto il tirocinio al County USC,

translation.en: then she spent five years working emergency at Cedars-Sinai.
translation.it: poi è stata cinque anni in pronto soccorso al Cedars Sinai.

translation.en: Her references are good as gold.
Then what the heck's she doin' here?
translation.it: E che cavolo ci fa qui?

translation.en: I guess she... wanted a change.
Even if you're too stubborn to admit it, we both know you need help.
translation.it: Anche se sei troppo testardo per ammetterlo, ti serve aiuto.

translation.en: [sighs] Give her a chance.
You got nothing to lose.
Thirty days.
But... if she can't cut it,
translation.it: Ma se non ce la fa,

translation.en: I've got your word this is the last time you stick your nose in my business.
translation.it: ho la tua parola che è l'ultima volta che metti il naso nei miei affari.

translation.en: [Jack] Ooh. Good choice.
This is so delicious.
Well, you sound surprised.
Oh, no, it's totally normal to have a gourmet kale and brussels sprout salad
translation.it: No, è normale mangiare un'insalata gourmet con verza e cavoletti di Bruxelles

translation.en: at a bar in the middle of nowhere surrounded by animal heads.
translation.it: in un bar in mezzo al nulla, circondata da teste di animali.

translation.en: You want something to drink?
I would kill for a latte.
Sorry. Nearest Starbucks, 80 miles away.
translation.it: Lo Starbucks più vicino è a 130 km.

translation.en: -Really? -Mm-hm.
You know there's a Starbucks in Kuala Lumpur?
translation.it: Sai che c'è uno Starbucks a Kuala Lumpur?

translation.en: Um, Nurses Beyond Borders.
A humanitarian.
There's so many things to learn about you, huh?
translation.it: Quante cose da imparare su di te.

translation.en: Hm. Yeah, well, according to Doc, I'm an ageist.
Well, good thing I'm still relatively young and attractive.
translation.it: Meno male che sono ancora giovane e attraente.

translation.en: You know, looks have nothing to do with it.
You're the only restaurant in town.
Oh, yeah, you keep telling yourself that.
What I keep telling myself is that I'm crazy
translation.it: Continuo a ripetermi che sono pazza a non aver fatto le valigie

translation.en: for not packing up and going home.
translation.it: Continuo a ripetermi che sono pazza a non aver fatto le valigie ed essere tornata a casa.

translation.en: Good news.
Doc's not gonna throw you a parade, but he agreed to try you out.
translation.it: Doc non ti farà una festa, ma ti prende in prova.

translation.en: You start immediately.
Hope, you've already hired me.
Well, here's the thing.
I'm paying your salary, but it is his practice, so...
translation.it: Io ti pago lo stipendio, ma lo studio è suo. Quindi...

translation.en: Why didn't you just tell me that?
Honey, then you wouldn't have come, would you?
Like my father said to my mother at the altar,
translation.it: Mio padre disse a mia madre all'altare:

translation.en: "You're already here, so let's make the best of it."
translation.it: ormai sei qui, quindi facciamo del nostro meglio.

translation.en: Well, I'm not staying in that shack another night.
translation.it: Non starò in quella baracca un'altra sera.

translation.en: I gotta side with Mel on that one.
You stay out of this.
Do I need to remind you that we have a--
Oh, oh, I'm fully aware that we have a contract.
translation.it: So benissimo che abbiamo un contratto.

translation.en: Okay? I'm also aware that suitable housing was part of the deal,
translation.it: So anche che l'accordo prevedeva un alloggio consono,

translation.en: so technically, you're in breach.
Which means the contract is null and void. I can leave whenever I want.
translation.it: Il contratto è nullo e posso andarmene quando voglio.

translation.en: -[groans] -Can you afford to have her leave?
translation.it: Puoi permetterti che se ne vada?

translation.en: Well, why don't you get her a room at the Fitches'?
translation.it: Perché non le offri una stanza dai Fitch?

translation.en: I'll fix up the cabin. Ricky could help me.
translation.it: Sistemo io la baita. Può aiutarmi Ricky.

translation.en: I'm not made of money.
[snorts] Hope, please don't poor-mouth to me.
translation.it: Non fare la poveraccia con me.

translation.en: You and I both know you couldn't spend half of what you have if you tried.
translation.it: Non riusciresti a spendere neanche la metà di quello che hai.

translation.en: You're offering an awful lot of yourself to help a complete stranger.
translation.it: Stai offrendo tanto per aiutare una perfetta sconosciuta.

translation.en: Oh, Hope, I thought you knew me better than that.
translation.it: Pensavo mi conoscessi meglio di così.

translation.en: Jack, I've known you a long time.
translation.it: Jack, ti conosco da molto tempo.

translation.en: If Mel was short for Melvin, we wouldn't be having this conversation.
translation.it: Se Mel fosse l'abbreviazione di Melvin, non staremmo qui a parlare.

translation.en: I believe Hope has some good news for you.
translation.it: Credo che Hope abbia buone notizie per te.

translation.en: I'll put you up at the Fitches' while I figure out what to do with the cabin.
translation.it: Ti metterò dai Fitch mentre vedo cosa fare con la baita.

translation.en: The place with the handsy husband?
translation.it: Con il marito che allunga le mani.

translation.en: Did I say that?
You know, I can fight my own battles.
Never turn down help when deep in a foxhole.
translation.it: Non rifiutare un aiuto se sei in trincea.

translation.en: How about a show of Virgin River hospitality?
translation.it: Che ne dici di una dimostrazione della nostra ospitalità?

translation.en: Why don't I take you on a tour tomorrow?
translation.it: Ti porto a fare un tour domani.

translation.en: Okay, tell you what.
I'm gonna be at the river at seven a.m.
If you want to join me,
I'll be there.
Hey. Uh, so, should I just pull up a chart and grab a patient?
translation.it: Ehi. Prendo una cartella e vedo il paziente?

translation.en: -No. -No?
No. Until I can confirm that you are competent, no patients.
translation.it: No. Finché non avrò la conferma che sei competente, niente pazienti.

translation.en: Well, how can you confirm my competency if I can't see any patients?
translation.it: Come fa a confermare la mia competenza se non vedo i pazienti?

translation.en: Chitchat is over. I've got a waitin' room full of people.
translation.it: La chiacchierata è finita. La sala d'attesa è piena di gente.

translation.en: -Welcome. -Hi.
Oh, I am sorry that my husband isn't here to greet you as well.
translation.it: Mi spiace che mio marito non sia qui ad accoglierti.

translation.en: -Oh... -He's doing a supply run in Grace Valley.
translation.it: Sta comprando provviste a Grace Valley.

translation.en: We only have one room left, and, uh... I'm nervous that you won't like it.
translation.it: Abbiamo solo una stanza libera e temo che non ti piacerà.

translation.en: Hope told me that you're very picky.
translation.it: Hope dice che sei molto esigente.

translation.en: Yeah.
-[Jo Ellen] Come take a look. -[Mel] Okay.
-[Jo Ellen] After you. -[Mel] Thank you.
Boy, you picked the wrong place to rob.
translation.it: Hai scelto il posto sbagliato da derubare.

translation.en: Get your hands up.
Now turn around. Slowly.
Come on.
Hey, man.
Brady! [laughing]
Bro, what are you doing in here, man?
I was leaving you a note. Wanted to let you know I was okay.
translation.it: Ti lasciavo un biglietto. Per dirti che stavo bene.

translation.en: How the hell did you get in here?
Come on. I know where you keep the spare key.
translation.it: Dai, so dove tieni la chiave di riserva.

translation.en: Listen, I-- I've got plans this morning.
But why don't you go get something to eat, and then go up to my room,
translation.it: Ma perché tu non mangi qualcosa, poi vai in camera mia,

translation.en: grab some sleep, and then clean yourself up, okay?
translation.it: dormi un po' e poi ti dai una lavata, ok?

translation.en: [chuckles] All right.
Long time.
Welcome back.
Thanks, man.
Yeah.
[Jack] Hey!
Hey.
Are you coming up, or am I coming down?
-You're comin' down here. -Okay.
Oh, I see you got a coffee.
[sighs] Yeah. Paige's bakery truck.
You could have mentioned it.
-I believe in self-discovery. -Ah.
-And practicality. -Ah!
Yeah.
-No, thank you. -No, no, no. I insist.
Where are we going?
I cleared your morning with Doc.
translation.it: Tranquilla. Ho detto a Doc di concederti la mattina.

translation.en: You cleared my morning.
Well, there's no cell reception out here,
so I figured you wouldn't want to give Doc any more ammunition by being late, so...
translation.it: e ho pensato che non volessi dare altre munizioni a Doc facendo tardi.

translation.en: -Wow. -But let me help you.
No, no. I don't need your assistance, okay?
translation.it: No, non mi serve il tuo aiuto, ok?

translation.en: Okay. I'm sorry I called Doc for you. It won't happen again.
translation.it: Ok. Scusa se ho chiamato Doc per te. Non succederà più.

translation.en: Now, you wanna put your hand on my shoulder?
translation.it: Vuoi mettermi la mano sulla spalla?

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay, now step.
And... other one.
Step.
Okay.
-All right. We can leave this here. -Wait.
No. No, no, no.
My whole life is in that bag.
translation.it: La mia vita è lì dentro.

translation.en: Oh, look, no one's gonna take it.
-Hm? -Because no one's here.
-Trust me? -Hm.
Mm. Hey, thank you.
-Uh... How much further? -We're almost there.
It's not even the best part.
translation.it: Non è nemmeno la parte migliore.

translation.en: Eagles.
Here.
This is their favorite spot.
Mine too.
They're incredible. Huh.
Yeah.
So, what's next?
Nothin'.
Here.
Oh, thank you.
Yeah.
I think I can actually hear my heart beating.
translation.it: Credo di sentire il battito del mio cuore.

translation.en: "In peace, nothing so becomes a man..." Or woman...
translation.it: "Nella pace, nulla di meglio per diventare un uomo o una donna...

translation.en: -"...as modest stillness." -Shakespeare?
-Mm. -You an English major?
No, I never went to college.
But in my 20s, I loved to read while drinkin',
translation.it: Ma a 20 anni mi piaceva leggere mentre bevevo,

translation.en: so it kind of all evens out.
translation.it: quindi è più o meno uguale.

translation.en: -Is that hunters? -Yeah, could be.
Could be somethin' else.
There's a lot of illegal pot fields outside of Virgin River.
translation.it: Ci sono molti campi di erba illegali fuori Virgin River.

translation.en: But it's legal now.
Yeah. It doesn't stop the illegal growers from doin' business.
translation.it: Già. Non impedisce ai coltivatori illegali di fare affari.

translation.en: Cross them, and things can turn dangerous.
translation.it: Se li attraversi, puoi trovarti in pericolo.

translation.en: I used to work in the, uh... ER Level One Trauma Center,
translation.it: Lavoravo in traumatologia al pronto soccorso,

translation.en: so I've seen my fair share of what dangerous can do.
translation.it: quindi ne ho viste di cose causate dal pericolo.

translation.en: ER, huh?
Sounds like an intense job.
Yeah, you could say that.
But I'm sure owning a bar has its challenges.
translation.it: Ma sono sicura che possedere un bar ha le sue difficoltà.

translation.en: Piece of cake, compared to my time in the service.
translation.it: Una cavolata rispetto a quando ero in servizio.

translation.en: Marine. Joined up right out of high school.
translation.it: Sono entrato nei marine appena finito il liceo.

translation.en: Spent 20-plus years, mostly in the Middle East.
translation.it: Per più di 20 anni, soprattutto in Medio Oriente.

translation.en: Preacher was with me. And Brady. You haven't met him yet.
translation.it: Preacher era con me. Anche Brady. Non l'hai ancora conosciuto.

translation.en: Do you miss it?
Yes and no.
I had, um...
[coughs] People who... depended on me.
And Virgin River, well, it's, uh...
it's a utopia, compared to a war zone.
translation.it: È un'utopia rispetto a una zona di guerra.

translation.en: -Oh, here. -Oh... [sighs]
-Aah. -Thank you.
You're welcome.
Thanks for this morning.
It was my pleasure.
Well, I'll see you around.
Yeah, you will.
-See ya. -Bye.
Hello?
Is Doc here?
Hi, there. No, no, he's not in right now.
translation.it: Ciao. Non è qui al momento.

translation.en: He'll be back soon.
I'll wait.
Uh... I'm the new nurse practitioner. Maybe I can help you.
translation.it: Sono la nuova infermiera. Forse posso aiutarti.

translation.en: Uh... Oh, I'll wait for Doc. [groans]
-Um... When are you due? -Ooh...
Any day now.
-[whimpers] -It's okay.
Okay. I think I should take a look at you.
translation.it: Ok. Meglio se ti do un'occhiata

translation.en: I don't know when the doctor'll be back.
translation.it: perché non so quando tornerà il dottore.

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay.
-Okay. Can you stand? -Okay.
Uh... Yeah. [groans]
-[whimpers] Yeah. -It's okay. Just take a breath.
-Ready? One, two, three. Up. -Okay.
translation.it: - Pronta? Uno, due, tre. Su. - Ok.

translation.en: There you go.
It's okay. You're gonna be just fine.
translation.it: È tutto a posto. Andrà tutto bene.

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay.
-What's your name? -Polly.
-Polly Fishburn. -Polly Fishburn.
My name's Mel.
And I'm gonna take really good care of you, okay?
translation.it: E mi prenderò cura di te, ok?

translation.en: Okay.
You're gonna be just fine now. Can you get up on this table?
translation.it: Ora starai bene. Riesci a salire su questo tavolo?

translation.en: -Yeah. [groans] -Got it?
-You got it. You got it. -[sighs]
I've gone through last night's receipts twice.
translation.it: Ho riguardato due volte gli scontrini di ieri sera.

translation.en: -Mm-hm? -The cash box is light.
Oh, y-- you know what?
I advanced Ricky a week to prep the McCrea cabin for some maintenance. I--
translation.it: Ho dato un anticipo a Ricky per la manutenzione della baita McCrea.

translation.en: I thought I logged that. Must have forgotten.
Oh, look who's back in town...
translation.it: Guarda chi è tornato in paese:

translation.en: So, how long before you disappear again?
I told him he could stay as long as he wants.
translation.it: Gli ho detto che può stare quanto vuole.

translation.en: I'm gonna head to Clear River. Run some errands. Catch you in a bit.
translation.it: Vado a Clear River per delle commissioni. A dopo.

translation.en: Yeah.
Uh, I left...
a lot of kids behind who I couldn't help.
translation.it: ...molti ragazzi che non ho potuto aiutare.

translation.en: I can help Brady, okay? I'm not turning my back on him.
translation.it: Brady posso aiutarlo. Non gli volterò le spalle.

translation.en: Well, then, you may wanna change the locks on the office door.
translation.it: Allora meglio se cambi la serratura dell'ufficio.

translation.en: Or you may be "advancing Ricky" a whole lot more than a week's pay.
translation.it: O dovrai "anticipare a Ricky" molto più di una settimana di paga.

translation.en: What is goin' on?
-I'm with a patient. -No, I--
I'm almost done. I'll be right out.
Is everything okay?
You're doing fine. Your baby is doing fine, okay?
translation.it: Stai andando bene. Il bambino sta bene, ok?

translation.en: You're just having... some Braxton Hicks.
-Oh. -False labor pains.
-[chuckles] -They don't feel false though, do they?
-No. [laughs] -No.
Uh... Why don't you just lay here and rest,
and I'll go call your husband to come pick you up, okay?
translation.it: vado a dire a tuo marito di venire a prenderti.

translation.en: Okay.
Thanks, Mel.
You're very welcome.
-Who said you could give her an exam? -I was just doing my job.
translation.it: Chi ti ha detto di visitarla? Ho fatto solo il mio lavoro.

translation.en: This is my practice. My name is on that door.
translation.it: Questo è il mio studio. C'è il mio nome sulla porta.

translation.en: You do not work with a patient unless you have my permission.
translation.it: Non lavori con un paziente senza il mio permesso.

translation.en: Polly was having Braxton Hicks.
I had to examine her to make sure that she wasn't in premature labor.
translation.it: Dovevo visitarla, vedere che non fosse in travaglio prematuro.

translation.en: Did you know there's protein in her urine?
Don't lecture me about my patient.
translation.it: Non darmi lezioni sulla mia paziente.

translation.en: Well, it's not in her chart.
-I don't put everything in the chart. -Uh-huh.
-Okay, well, where do you put it? -Right here.
translation.it: - Ok, dove lo mette? - Qui dentro.

translation.en: And if you're not here to tell me what's not in the chart?
translation.it: E se non è qui per dirmi cosa non c'è nella cartella?

translation.en: My dear, I'm not just old, I'm old-school.
translation.it: Mia cara, non sono solo vecchio, sono della vecchia scuola.

translation.en: And in my day, a nurse would never, never question
translation.it: Ai miei tempi, un'infermiera non dubitava mai dei metodi

translation.en: the methods of a supervising physician.
translation.it: Ai miei tempi, un'infermiera non dubitava mai dei metodi del medico responsabile.

translation.en: A nurse would know her place.
Well, I hope you'll join me in the 21st century.
translation.it: Beh, spero che mi raggiungerà nel ventunesimo secolo.

translation.en: And your point is?
This time it was false labor, but what about the next Polly or whoever?
translation.it: Oggi era un falso travaglio, ma cosa ne sarà della prossima Polly o che so io?

translation.en: Wh-- Do you want me to just stand by
translation.it: Vuole che stia qui a guardare

translation.en: and watch someone bleed out if you're not here?
translation.it: uno che muore dissanguato se non è qui?

translation.en: You should have called me.
I had things under control.
These patients, they are like my family.
translation.it: Questi pazienti sono come la mia famiglia.

translation.en: And I cannot trust you with them
translation.it: E non posso fidarmi di te

translation.en: unless I know for sure you're not gonna hurt someone.
translation.it: se non so che non farai del male a qualcuno.

translation.en: [sighs] So, if I can't do what I was hired to do, what is it that you want me to do?
translation.it: Se non posso fare ciò per cui sono stata assunta, cosa vuole che faccia?

translation.en: Well, straighten up the office.
File things. Uh-- Keep the coffee pot full.
I like mine black and fresh.
translation.it: Il caffè mi piace nero e fresco.

translation.en: Hello, Polly.
[Mel] He's refusing to let me do my job.
translation.it: Non mi lascia fare il mio lavoro.

translation.en: -Give it time. -No, no, no, no, no.
This is not about time.
Okay, good medicine is about teamwork, and he doesn't want me on his team.
translation.it: In medicina serve lavoro in squadra, ma lui non mi vuole nella sua squadra.

translation.en: He'll come around.
He is rude, he is demeaning,
and he's a big-time chauvinist.
The man's got his quirks, I'll give you that.
translation.it: Ha le sue stranezze, lo ammetto.

translation.en: It's obvious that he needs somebody, but it's not gonna work like this, okay?
translation.it: È ovvio che ha bisogno di qualcuno, ma così non funziona.

translation.en: It needs to be his idea, or he's never gonna accept it.
translation.it: Deve essere un'idea sua o non lo accetterà mai.

translation.en: My grandfather was just like him.
So, you understand.
Yeah, and he's never gonna change.
[sighs] Look, Hope, the bottom line is that this is not what I signed up for.
translation.it: Senti, Hope, il punto è che non è quello che doveva essere.

translation.en: Join the club, sweetheart.
Life rarely gives us what we want.
translation.it: La vita raramente ci dà quello che vogliamo.

translation.en: Okay... I didn't join a club, okay? I took a job.
translation.it: Non sono entrata in un club. Ho accettato un lavoro.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I have to give you notice.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, ti do il mio preavviso.

translation.en: I'll give you time to find someone, but you need to start looking now.
translation.it: Ti do il tempo di trovare qualcuno, ma inizia a cercare ora.

translation.en: She's so beautiful.
-♪ And I saw my reflection ♪ -[Mark] So, where's Bill?
-♪ In the snow-covered hills ♪ -Work.
Auntie Mel.
-♪ Till the landslide brought me down ♪ -You make beautiful babies.
So, when are you two gonna make me an aunt?
-♪ What is love? ♪ -We're working on it.
-♪ Can the child ♪ -Work harder.
-♪ Rise above? ♪ -Okay.
-You know I rarely agree with your sister. -♪ Can I sail ♪
translation.it: Do raramente ragione a tua sorella.

translation.en: -♪ Ocean tides? -She's right.
-♪ Can I handle the seasons ♪ -I have to run. Sorry.
[Jack] Hey, Mel.
-♪ Well, maybe ♪ -You better take a look at this.
-♪ Well, maybe ♪ -[Mel] Jesus.
I'm pretty sure that's not Jesus.
